title: Oberoi parent EIH gets into branded residences in Mumbai
description: The Oberoi Group launches The Oberoi Residential Suites in Mumbai, offering luxury amenities and modern design. EIH Limited reports a 28% revenue increase, with profits after tax up by 55% from the previous year.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
